El Carmel (Catalan pronunciation: [əl kə: Carmel became infamous in 2005 for a major accident during the construction of a tunnel.  It brought to a halt the expansion works on line 5 of the Barcelona Metro and led to the evacuation of dozens of buildings in the area.
